title: Don Tattaunawa da Tawagar
subtitle: Ƙungiyar Usul tana ƙunshe da injiniyoyi, masu zane, da masu bincike waɗanda ke da sha'awar gina kayan aikin dijital don sauya binciken Musulunci.
board-subtitle: Usul.AI wani aikin Seemore Foundation ne, inda shugabanninta suka ƙunshi kwararru masu daraja a binciken addinin Musulunci da kuma sabon fasaha. Kowanne suna jagoranci a fannoni nasu, tare da shekaru na kwarewa a yayin fara dabaru na yadda muke samun da hulɗa da ilimi. Tare, suna tabbatar da cewa ƙungiyar tana ci gaba da aiwatar da manufa.

adnan-zulfiqar.name: Adnan Zulfiqar
adnan-zulfiqar.description: Shi Farfesa ne na shari'a a Makarantar Koyon Shari'a ta Boston College, inda yake koyarwa da rubuce-rubuce akan shari'ar laifi da dokokin yaki. Ya taimaka wajen tsara dokokin shari'ar addinin Musulunci ga Maldives da Somalia.

intisar-rabb.name: Intisar Rabb
intisar-rabb.description: Ita Farfesa ce ta dokoki da tarihi a Harvard, ta ƙware a dokar aikata manyan laifuka da fassara (usul al-fiqh). Ita ke jagorantar [Shirin Nazarin Shari'ar Musulunci](https://pil.law.harvard.edu/) da [Dakin Nazarin SHARIAsource](https://portal.shariasource.com/), da kuma [IslamicLawBlog](https://islamiclaw.blog/).

zeki-mokhtarzada.name: Zeki Mokhtarzada
zeki-mokhtarzada.description: Shi masani ne mai kirkirar fasaha. Ya yi aiki a matsayin CTO a yawancin kananan kamfanoni da kuma ya hada kai wajen kirkiro dama, ciki har da webs.com (Vistaprint ta siya) da Truebill (yanzu Rocket Money).

anas-hassanien.name: Anas Hassanien
anas-hassanien.description: Shi injiniya ne na software tare da ƙwarewa a dukkan bangarori, wanda yayi aiki a Simli AI a baya. Yana jagorantar ci gaban manyan kayayyaki a Usul.AI.

abtsam-saleh.name: Abtsam Saleh
abtsam-saleh.description: Ita mai neman PhD ce a Jami'ar Harvard dake bincike akan al'amuran zamantakewar fasahohi wanda ya fi mayar da hankali da jama'a, kuma tana aiki a matsayin mai gudanarwa da mai bincike a Usul.AI, inda take jagoranci ayyuka da haɗa injiniya da bincike.

ryad-ramo.name: Ryad Ramo
ryad-ramo.description: Shi mai bincike ne akan ilimin Musulunci da tarihin, yana da BA a Nazarin addinin Musulunci, kuma ya kafa wallafa Gems of Al-Andalus. Yana aiki kan digitization da annote na littattafai a Usul AI.

ahmed-aktan.name: Ahmet Aktan
ahmed-aktan.description: Shi mai bincike ne wanda ya kware a nazarin addinin Musulunci tare da PhD daga Jami'ar Al-Azhar. Yana jagorancin ƙungiyar digitization da ƙoƙarin faɗaɗawar tarin a Usul AI.

ismail-safadi.name: Ismail Safadi
ismail-safadi.description: Shi mai bincike ne akan fiqhorin Hanafi. Ya yi karatu a Jami'ar Jordan da kuma a Turkiyya. Yana aiki kan digitization da annote na littattafai a Usul AI.

abdellatif-abdelfattah.name: Abdellatif Abdelfattah
abdellatif-abdelfattah.description: Shi injiniya ne wanda ya yi aiki a matsayin injiniyan kirkiro a Tarteel AI da kuma namu Usul AI. Yayi jagoranci a bangaren injiniya a Quran.com da kuma yana aiki a Twitter.

ahmed-riad.name: Ahmed Riad
ahmed-riad.description: Shi injiniya ne na software wanda ya yi aiki a matsayin injiniyan-farfado a wasu ƙanana kamfanoni (ciki har da Remail AI, Betterbook, da namu Usul AI). Har ila yau ya yi aiki a matsayin injiniya a Qur'an.com.

mohamed-lamine.name: Mohamed Lamine
mohamed-lamine.description: Mohamed ya kasance jagoran zane a Thmanyah, yana ba da shawara ga farawa don ƙirƙirar samfura daga 0 zuwa 1.

rahma-fateen.name: Rahma Fateen
rahma-fateen.description: Rahma ta jagoranci fassarar Larabci a Tarteel AI. Tsohuwar fassara ce a Human Rights Watch.

ahmed-khan.name: Ahmed Khan
ahmed-khan.description: Ahmed ɗalibi ne a Kwalejin Zaytuna. Shi ne mahaliccin kwasfan fayiloli na The Creative Minority.

mohsen-kadivar.name: Mohsen Kadivar
mohsen-kadivar.description: Mohsen Kadivar Farfesa mai bincike ne kan Nazarin Addinin Musulunci a Sashen Nazarin Addinai. Ya kasance a Jami'ar Duke tun 2009. Babban abin da ke sha'awarsa shi ne tunanin Musulunci na gargajiya da zamani. Ayyukansa suna a gefen "Nazarin Musulunci" da kuma sabuwar "Tarihin Tunani".

issam-eido.name: Issam Eido
issam-eido.description: Issam Eido tsohon Farfesan Ziyara ne na Nazarin Addinin Musulunci da Larabci daga Makarantar Ilimin Addinai ta Jami'ar Chicago (2013-2015). Bincikensa ya mayar da hankali kan Al-Qur'ani a ƙarshen zamanin da, Nazarin Hadīth, da Sufanci.

intisar-rabb.name: Intisar Rabb
intisar-rabb.description: Ita Farfesa ce ta dokoki da tarihi a Harvard, ta ƙware a dokar aikata manyan laifuka da fassara (usul al-fiqh). Ita ke jagorantar [Shirin Nazarin Shari'ar Musulunci](https://pil.law.harvard.edu/) da [Dakin Nazarin SHARIAsource](https://portal.shariasource.com/), da kuma [IslamicLawBlog](https://islamiclaw.blog/).

roles.research-advisor: Mai bayar da shawara kan bincike
roles.research-lead-advisor: Jagoran Bincike & Mai bayar da shawara
